claim: 1978 be the most recent year build when the year of enter service be more recent than 2003 and knot be less than 27
resp:
To evaluate the claim, we need to identify all ships from the table built in or before 1978, entered service after 2003, and have a speed of less than 27 knots.

### Step-by-step Reasoning:

1. **Identify Ships Built on or Before 1978:**
   - ms bastia (built 1974)
   - ms giraglia (built 1981) - Excluded because built year is after 1978
   - ms moby ale (built 1969)
   - ms moby vincent (built 1974)
   - ms moby fantasy (built 1976)
   - ms moby baby (built 1966)
   - ms moby love (built 1975)
   - ms moby lally (built 1974)
   - ms moby drea (built 1975)
   - ms moby otta (built 1976)
   - ms moby tommy (built 2002) - Excluded because built year is after 1978
   - ms moby aki (built 2005) - Excluded because built year is after 1978
   - ms moby wonder (built 2001) - Excluded because built year is after 1978
   - ms moby corse (built 1978)

2. **From the above list, identify ships that entered service after 2003:**
   - ms moby vincent (entered service 1990) - Excluded because year of entry is before 2004
   - ms moby fantasy (entered service 1992) - Excluded because year of entry is before 2004
   - ms moby baby (entered service 1996) - Excluded because year of entry is before 2004
   - ms moby love (entered service 1998) - Excluded because year of entry is before 2004
   - ms moby lally (entered service 2000) - Excluded because year of entry is before 2004
   - ms moby drea (entered service 2003) - Excluded because year of entry is not after 2003
   - ms moby otta (entered service 2006)
   - ms moby corse (entered service 2010)

3. **From these, identify ships with knots less than 27:**
   - ms moby otta (knots 27) - Excluded because speed is not less than 27
   - ms moby corse (knots 21) - This ship meets all criteria

4. **Determine if 1978 is the most recent build year among qualifying ships:**
   - Only ms moby corse qualifies with a build year of 1978.

Since ms moby corse, built in 1978, is the only ship meeting all specified conditions (built on or before 1978, entered service after 2003, and knots less than 27), the claim is TRUE.
